short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Google Meet with Call eXplorer: a Chrome app for live transcripts, summaries, and instant meeting-related answers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Call eXplorer: Elevate Your online meeting experience!

Transform the way you collaborate on Google Meet calls with eXplorer. Experience the power of live transcripts, efficient call summaries, and an intelligent chat bot‚Äîall in one intuitive Chrome extension. Upgrade your virtual meetings and embrace the future of communication with call eXplorer! Download now and explore a new era of productivity and engagement.

üéôÔ∏è Live Transcripts in Real Time:
Never miss a moment during your virtual meetings! With call eXplorer, enjoy the convenience of live transcripts that capture every spoken word in real time. Whether you need to reference key points or revisit important discussions, our cutting-edge technology ensures accurate and instant transcription, enhancing the accessibility and productivity of your Google Meet calls.

ü§ñ Intelligent Chat Bot:
Meet your virtual assistant ‚Äì the call eXplorer Chat Bot! This advanced feature takes your Google Meet experience to new heights by providing instant answers to any questions related to your call. Whether you're seeking clarification on a discussed topic or need a quick recap, the Chat Bot is ready to assist, ensuring that information is at your fingertips, precisely when you need it.

üìã Summarize with Ease:
Say goodbye to lengthy note-taking sessions. call eXplorer empowers you to effortlessly generate call summaries. The extension intelligently extracts key insights, highlights critical discussions, and compiles a comprehensive summary, allowing you to focus on what matters most‚Äîmaking informed decisions and driving meaningful outcomes. Simply ask the chat bot to generate a summary of the call, or ask whatever you feel like asking it about the call.

üöÄ Seamless Integration:
Designed for simplicity and efficiency, call eXplorer seamlessly integrates into your Google Meet interface. The extension is user-friendly, requiring no complex setups or additional downloads. Embrace a hassle-free experience as call eXplorer effortlessly enhances your virtual collaboration.
